column2: Latest;Preah Sihanouk: On the morning of September 5
column4: two Indian navy vessels; INS KILTAN (P30)
column7: entered Sihanoukville Autonomous Port to visit the Kingdom of Cambodia for a four-day visit.------They were welcomed by HE Rear Admiral Ros Veasna
column8: Deputy Commander of the Marine Base
column9: and many other Vice Admirals. (Huy Bunleng)------Specifications:------ ------INS KILTAN (P30) ------INS SAHYADRI (F49)
